pr_title: MP native image no longer misses bean types for proxies.

timeline.message:
MP native image no longer misses bean types for proxies.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: Depending on how proper you want to be, you may want to see if the bean is PassivationCapable and if so use the return value of its getId() method.
timeline.author: ljnelson

replies.bodyText: I think we can live with a certain amount of improper, unless this would fail for some cases.
replies.author: tomas-langer
